x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: AidSync – Smart Disaster Relief Logistics Tracker

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

AidSync automates emergency logistics using:

  • ITOM and CMDB for mapping relief assets and field equipment.
  • Field Service Management (FSM) for dispatching volunteers.
  • IntegrationHub for GPS and weather data.
  • Flow Designer for task automation and alert routing.
  • Service Portal for NGOs and citizens to report needs.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

The use of Google Maps and OpenWeather APIs is required. We can also use IoT integration for vehicle tracking.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Some of these areas have low connectivity zones, so GPS reliability would be a problem. Validating citizen-submitted reports and also managing high traffic during disasters.
